name: Apple Blue Cheese Salad
author: ALRIESTER
summary: Easy to make ahead, especially for guests who always love this salad. Granny Smith apple marinated in balsamic vinaigrette salad dressing, bleu cheese, pecans, and bacon all tossed over romaine.
ingredients: 1  Granny Smith apple, cored and julienned
directions: Place the julienned apple into a bowl with the balsamic vinaigrette
Refrigerate for at least one hour to marinate
Cook bacon in the microwave or in a skillet over medium-high heat until browned
In a salad bowl, combine the blue cheese, pecans, bacon and romaine lettuce, and toss to blend
When ready to serve, pour the apples and dressing over the top
